scripts.stat-paragraphs:all: git ls-files 'docs/journal/**/index.md' | while IFS= read -r f; do bin/stat-paragraphs.sh "$f"; done
scripts.serve: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build --trace
scripts.prebuild: npm run stat-pieces && npm run stat-paragraphs && npm run stat-history
